mapper.select: SELECT user_id , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(user_password), 'raison') as password, user_name as name, email , role_id as roleId, init_pass_yn as initPassYn FROM ieda_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_password = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{password}, 'raison'))

mapper.update: UPDATE ieda_user SET user_password = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{user.password}, 'raison')), init_pass_yn = 'Y', update_user_id = #{user.updateUserId}, update_date = now() WHERE user_id = #{user.userId}
